all.map:
(doc) ->
 if doc.doc_type is 'productDoc'
  emit doc.barcode, 
  {
   barcode: doc.barcode
   name: doc.name
   quantity: doc.quantity
   description: doc.description
   tags: doc.tags
   category: doc.category
  }

admin.map:
(doc) ->
 if doc.doc_type is 'productDoc'
  emit doc.barcode, doc
